text.p: Swedish commercial bank Handelsbanken said on Friday it would coordinate its mortgage funding in a special unit.

"Svenska Handelsbanken intends to co-ordinate its mortgage operations in a sub-group in which Stadshypotek constitutes the parent company and Handelsbanken Hypotek a subsidiary," Handelsbanken said in a statement.
The change was conditional on approval by Sweden's Financial Supervisory Authority, it said.
It said most future funding for the mortgage group on the Swedish market would be made in the name of Stadshypotek.
"Therefore there will be no new funding made in the name of Handelsbanken Hypotek," the bank said.
New funding would thus be raised through further issues of existing Stadshypotek bonds and through two new bond loans.
Handelsbanken bought mortgage lender Stadshypotek earlier this year.
